DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess ophthalmic compatibility three different silicone hydrogel lenses worn overnight basis six night .
DOC.brief_title: Ophthalmic Compatibility During Seven Days Continuous Wear Silicone Hydrogel Lenses
DOC.criteria: Is least 17 year age full legal capacity volunteer Is correctable visual acuity 20/30 better ( eye ) habitual vision correction Has ocular examination last two year Is current soft ( hydrogel silicone hydrogel ) contact lens wearer Has clear cornea active ocular disease Can successfully fit lens use study Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply Is pregnant lactating Has undergone corneal refractive surgery Currently wear lenses extend wear basis extend wear within six month prior study Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
